The viceroys have considerable military and civilian power in their provinces, effectively acting as the Emperor's regional governors and thereby simplifying the administrative system of the Empire.
translation: 我们把明朝末年仅仅关注北方边疆的总督制度扩充为一个包含八个永久地方，覆盖中国大部的制度。总督们在本省内拥有可观的军事和民政权力，像皇帝治下的地区长官一样有效进行工作，从而简化帝国的行政系统。

original: Our conquest of China has allowed those living on the fringes of the Empire to rise above their station. A series of campaigns must be led to restore order to these territories and extend the Great Qing's power over our enemies.
translation: 我们对中国的征服让那些生活在帝国边缘上的人攫取了他们不配的地位。必须发动一系列战役来恢复对这些领土的统治，将大清的权力扩展到我们的敌人身上。

original: The Oirats are skillful and feared horsemen, capable of embarrassing far vaster infantry-based armies with their greater maneuverability. The sound of hoofbeats drumming across the plains shall strike fear into the hearts of our enemies!
translation: 瓦剌人是出色且无畏的骑兵，擅长利用自己优越的机动性羞辱数量上远大于他们的步兵部队。草原上传来的马蹄声将会把恐惧直接刺入敌人的心脏！

original: The Alliance of the Four Oirat Tribes binds the Western Mongols together. Made up of the Dzungars (or Choros), Torghut, Dörbet and Khoshut, it first emerged in 1399 and has held firm ever since, allowing a powerful Oirat state to emerge Central Asian Steppe.
translation: 瓦剌四部联盟将西蒙古人联合在一起。联盟由准格尔部（绰罗斯部）、土尔扈特部、杜尔伯特部和和硕特部组成，于1399年首次联合，并从此组成了牢不可破的联盟，使得强大的瓦剌国家出现于中亚草原。

original: There are many among our people who remember the exploits of our people under the leadership of the Great Khan. They would wish to emulate these and reclaim his legacy - but this time, the Khan should be an Oirat, not one of the Eastern Mongols.
translation: 我们的族群中有很多人都还记得我们在大汗领导下取得的英雄功绩。他们希望能达到这样的高度并继承大汗的遗产，但是这次，大汗应该是瓦剌人，而不是一个东蒙古人。

original: The Todo Besheg or 'Clear' Script adapts the Mongolian script to ensure that all sounds in the spoken Oirat language can be distinguished in it, as well as making it easier to transcribe Sanskrit and Tibetic languages. It will be a considerable boon to us in our administration and in spreading knowledge acquired by our neighbors and foreign subjects.
translation: 托忒字母（「清楚的」字母）在蒙文字母的基础上进行了修改，使得它能够区分卫拉特口语中所有语音，并且更容易转写梵文和藏文。托忒文对于改善行政及获取来自邻国和附庸的文化知识有很大的增益。

original: The Dzungars or 'left hands' are the most fearsome tribe of the Oirats. Widely hated and feared by our enemies, they will fight to the last man, woman or child rather than surrender to a foreign ruler.
translation: 准噶尔，或蒙古语的「左手」是瓦剌中最令人可畏的部落。为我们的敌人所惧恨有加，他们会奋战到最后一个男人、女人和孩童，而不会向外国君王投降。

original: As the original Mongols, we Mongols of the Ilkh Mongol Uls ('Great Mongolian State') see ourselves as the primary heirs to Genghis Khan's great empire. Given the slightest chance, our people would seek to emulate the exploits of the Great Khan and reclaim his legacy, reuniting the once-vast territories of the Mongol Khanate.
translation: 身为最纯正原初的蒙古，我们大蒙古国，自视为成吉思汗的伟大帝国的第一继承者。即便机会渺茫，我们的人民仍会试图效仿大汗的功业并宣称他的遗产，将曾经辽阔的蒙古汗国的领土再次一统。

original: In the 13th century, Kublai Khan conquered China and founded the Yuan dynasty. Claiming Genghis' title of Great Khan as well as that of the Emperor of China, the Yuan state was sometimes known as the Empire of the Great Khan. Although eventually defeated by the Ming, who confined our power to Mongolia itself, memory of the Yuan lives on, as does the ambition to reclaim the Celestial Throne if ever the chance should arise.
translation: 在十三世纪，忽必烈汗征服了中国并建立了元朝。同时宣称成吉思汗的大汗头衔和中国皇帝的头衔，元朝曾有时被称为大汗帝国。尽管最终被大明击败，而它将我们限制在蒙古地区，元朝的记忆仍然留存，以及，假如时机允许再次问鼎中原的野心。

original: The prowess of the Mongolian horsemen is renowned across the entire world. Our enemies will tremble with fear at the sight of a dust cloud in the distance, fearing that it might signify our cavalry's approach!
translation: 蒙古骑兵的神威在整个世界都赫赫有名。我们的敌人会在看到远处飞扬的尘土时会因恐惧而颤抖，担忧这可能意味着我们骑兵的进击！

original: In order to ensure that messengers could travel fast enough to keep up with Mongol armies, Genghis Khan instituted a system of relay stations or 'yams', which were set up every 30-60 km to provide food, shelter and spare horses for Mongol army messengers. This allowed messages to travel as fast as a horse can gallop, with fatigue no longer slowing the speed a messenger could travel. By these means, our empire was able to overcome the logistical problems caused by the vast scale of the Pax Mongolica - at least temporarily.
translation: 为了确保让信使能够追上蒙古军队，成吉思汗建立了一个驿站系统，每隔30-60公里就设一个驿站，为信使提供食物、住宿及换乘马匹。这使得信使能够策马狂奔，而无需担心疲劳的马匹阻碍其赶路速度。利用以上手段，使得我们的庞大的「蒙古和平」帝国能够克服后勤问题，至少暂时能够。

original: Each of our soldiers typically maintains 3 or 4 horses, allowing them to change horse each time their mount becomes tired and so travel at high speed for days without stopping. Furthermore, their extra mounts provide them with food reserves through mare's milk as well as horsemeat, making our armies far less vulnerable to starvation than other, so-called civilized nations' armies. This allows us to outmaneuver our enemies with ease, covering a staggering amount of territory in shorter periods than they had believed to be possible.
translation: 我们的每名士兵通常都会保有三或四匹马，这使得他们可以在坐骑疲劳时更换马匹，这样就能数日内高速前行而不需休整。此外，士兵的额外坐骑通过马奶和马肉为他们提供了食物储备，使得我们的军队比其他所谓的文明国家的军队更不容易忍饥挨饿。这使我们能够轻松地战胜我们的敌人，在远比他们想象的更短的时间内覆盖惊人面积的领土。

original: The Kheshig once formed the formidable bodyguard of the Great Mongol Khan. Their descendants will continue to protect the Khans of Mongolia as they ride into battle against their people's foes!
translation: 怯薛曾组成了蒙古大汗的强大禁卫军。他们的后代将继续保护蒙古的可汗们，因为他们正在与人民的敌人作战！

original: The Chagatai Khanate lies sheltered between Lake Balkhash and the Tian Shan Mountains. It is a harsh and unforgiving land, one which our people can harness to use as a weapon against would-be invaders.
translation: 察合台汗国位于巴尔喀什湖和天山山脉之间。 这是一片严酷而无情的土地，我们的人民可以利用它作为对抗潜在入侵者的武器。

original: The current Khan of Chagatai traces his line back to Chagatai Khan, the second son of Genghis Khan, who once ruled these lands and established a powerful Mongol successor state. Although that empire has now been broken up between Chagatai, Yarkand and Transoxiana, the current Khans can still claim considerable legitimacy by appealing to the legacy of their ancestor.
translation: 现任察合台大汗的血脉可上溯至察合台汗，即成吉思汗的次子，他曾经依托此地，建立了一个强大的蒙古后继国家。虽然这个帝国现在分裂为察合台汗国、叶尔羌汗国及河中三部分，因为血脉的关系，现任大汗仍对这些地区拥有强大的法理宣称。

original: The Chagatai language of the eastern steppes is widely used as far afield as the Timurid Empire as the carrier of the thoughts and ideas of the great Mongol lineage. We must promote the use of our ancestral language and allow the Chagatai literary tradition to flourish.
translation: 东部大草原上的察合台语作为蒙古统治家族的思想和理念的载体，广泛地为远至帖木儿帝国所使用。我们必须提倡使用我们祖先的语言，使得察合台语文学传统更加昌盛。

original: Boxed in between the Empire of China, the Timurids, the Uzbeks and the Oirats, we face a constant struggle to maintain our borders. Our ever-vigilant soldiers have plentiful opportunities to hone their skills in battle, giving birth to a battle-hardened warrior people ready to reclaim the legacy of the Great Khan.
translation: 在中华帝国，帖木儿帝国，乌兹别克人和瓦剌之间，我们面临着维持边疆的不懈斗争。我们始终保持警惕的士兵有很多机会在战斗中磨练自己的技能，这诞生了一个个饱经沙场的战士，他们已准备好重新夺回大汗的遗产。

original: The constant power struggles between the various princes, local noblemen, cities and tribes in the Chagatai Khanate have produced a nation of highly-adept schemers and politicians. If we can put aside our quarrels and channel this energy towards outsmarting our enemies, it would be a great boon to our people.
translation: 在察合台汗国的诸多王子，当地贵族，城市和部落之间的不断权力斗争已经产生了一个由高度熟练的阴谋家和政治家组成的国家。如果我们能够把我们的争吵放在一边并将这种能量用于超越我们的敌人，那对我们的人民来说将是一个巨大的福音。

original: Has had the event §YThird Literati Purge§!.
translation: 事件§Y己卯士祸§!已经发生

original: Total own and non-tributary subject development is at least $VAL|Y$.\n
translation: 自身与非朝贡属国的总发展度达到$VAL|Y$。\n

original: Total own and non-tributary subject development is less than $VAL|Y$.\n
translation: 自身与非朝贡属国的总发展度低于$VAL|Y$。\n

original: Having restored order to the Celestial Empire, our dynasty rides a wave of popularity among our new subjects.
translation: 重建天朝秩序后，我们的家族深受我们新臣民的拥戴。

original: Our subjects welcome our efforts to reunite the Celestial Empire and bring the territories that have lapsed from our rule back into the fold.
translation: 我们的属国欣然接受了我们统一中华帝国并重夺曾经失去的领土做出的努力。

original: With the loss of the Mandate of Heaven to [emperor_of_china.GetUsableName], part of the pressure on our dynasty has abated. Even though many challenges await us in future, we may leave the poisoned chalice of governing the Celestial Empire to the [emperor_of_china.GetAdjective] [emperor_of_china.Monarch.GetTitle].
translation: 随着将天命丢给了[emperor_of_china.GetUsableName]，我们王朝的部分压力消退了。即便前方仍有重重挑战，我们可以将统治中华帝国的毒酒杯送给[emperor_of_china.GetAdjective][emperor_of_china.Monarch.GetTitle]。

original: A series of sweeping reforms to rejuvenate the Korean nation by improving its governance and increasing the general prosperity of its people have been implemented.
translation: 让朝鲜恢复元气的一系列笼统的改革，包括改进她的政府以及增加人民的收入，已经被实施了。

original: Many of the Evenk people live in family brigades that intimately know the lay of the land and the wild foods of the area. They are able to survive in even the most inhospitable environments and move through their territory with ease.
translation: 许多鄂温克人生活在氏族军队中，他们非常了解该地区的土地和野生食物。他们能够在最恶劣的环境中生存，并轻松地穿越其领土。

original: The Evenk practice of reindeer herding allows us to travel great distances to trade furs, wild foods and goods, and be ever resourceful in the struggle to survive in the barren landscape that constitutes our home.
translation: 鄂温克放牧驯鹿的做法让我们可以去远方交易毛皮、野生食物和商品，并且在构成我们故乡的贫瘠景观的生存斗争中拥有足够的资源。

original: The Evenks can survive anywhere and will readily teach foreigners these skills, enabling us to absorb others into the Evenk way of life.
translation: 鄂温克可以在任何地方生存，并且已准备好向外国人传授这些技能，使我们能够吸收其他人融入鄂温克的生活方式。

original: The natural resources of the Siberian tundra and taiga provide the materials to build many things, facilitating the development of towns.
translation: 西伯利亚苔原和针叶林的自然资源为建造许多东西提供了材料，促进了城镇的发展。

original: By exchanging our furs for the traditional Mongol clothing, the deel, we can better attract Mongolian Mercenaries because we are similar in appearance to their lords. They come to us in droves, allowing us to make ready use of them against our enemies.
translation: 用我们的皮草交换蒙古袍子（德勒），让我们在穿戴上与蒙古王公更加相似，可使我们招致更多的蒙古商人。蒙古商人们赶着畜群来贸易，使得我们可以利用他们对付我们的敌人。

original: Nobody knows the forest of the land like we do. We are able to move swiftly and silently. Our leaders have learnt to traverse terrain others would consider treacherous with ease, something we can use this to our advantage in battle.
translation: 没有人像我们一样了解这片土地的森林。我们能够迅速而安静地行动。我们的将领已经学会了穿越其他人会轻易地认为是危险的地形，我们可以利用这一点在战斗中占据优势。

original: Trading basic firearms for our furs and reindeer, we have discovered new ways to hunt and win in battle. Firearms can fire greater distances than our traditional bows and do more damage than our knives.
translation: 通过用我们的皮毛和驯鹿交易基本火器，我们发现了狩猎和在战斗中获胜的新方法。与我们的传统弓箭相比，火器射程更远，并且比我们的刀具能造成更大的伤害。

original: Every owned province in the §YEast Siberia§! Region gets '§YSiberian Boom§!' for §Y10 years§!, giving the following effects:\nLocal Goods Produced Modifier: §G+15.0%§!
translation: 我们拥有的所有位于§Y东西伯利亚§!地区的省份获得「§Y西伯利亚繁荣§!」修正并在§Y十年内§!获得如下效果：\n本地商品产出修正：§G+15.0%§!

original: Investment in Siberia has attracted a number of prospectors and adventurers to the region, boosting productivity.
translation: 在西伯利亚的投资吸引了许多淘金者和冒险家来到这块区域，增加了产出。

original: Waypoints along the most major roads in the realm not only make travel easier, but help impose central authority in outlying areas.
translation: 在领土大多数主要道路上设立宿场不仅让旅行更加便利，也让中央权威辐射到外地。

original: Accommodating a vast and constantly-changing audience of lords in the capital has made the government particularly adept at handling many diplomatic issues at once.
translation: 在首都容纳大量且经常交替的领主使得政府在一次性处理多项外交议题上驾轻就熟。

original: In our realm, everyone knows where they belong.
translation: 在我国境内，每个人都了解自己的位置所在。

original: Merchant ships endowed with the government's Red Seal permit enjoy special protections and privileges, making trade for them much less risky.
translation: 拥有政府朱印状担保的商船可享受特别的保护和特权，让他们进行的贸易更少风险。

original: Our commerce and industry is second to none, and representatives of our greatest mercantile interests can be found anywhere on the globe.
translation: 我国的工商业首屈一指，我们广大的商业利益代表遍布全球。

original: Surveying the countryside for unreported properties has revealed new sources of income for the government.
translation: 调查乡间未申报的财产给政府带来了新财源。

original: Secure loans have made it easier than ever to fund new construction projects across the country.
translation: 担保贷款使得在全国支援新的建设工程更加容易了。

original: Among all the warring realms, we have proven ourselves to be a power to be reckoned with, and our strength has been recognized both within and beyond our domain.
translation: 在诸大名间，我等已被证明可跻身其列，吾辈实力被领内外广泛认可。

original: Intervention in the Crisis of the [From.GetAdjective] Dynasty

The [From.GetAdjective] Emperor has lost control of the north. The peasant warlord Li Zicheng has gathered a large host of rebels and bandits under his command and seized control of [CSH.Capital.GetCapitalName], proclaiming himself Emperor of China. This moment of [From.GetAdjective] weakness presents an ideal opportunity for us to seize control of northern China and, if all goes well - and if we see fit to exercise it - set the stage for our own claim to the Mandate of Heaven.
translation: [From.GetAdjective]皇帝失去了对北方的控制。农民领袖李自成聚起了大批叛军匪徒并控制了[CSH.Capital.GetCapitalName]，宣称自己是中国皇帝。[From.GetAdjective]弱点出现的时机给我们带来一个绝佳的机会去控制中国北方，如果一切顺利的话——而且时机成熟——让这成为我们宣称天命的舞台。

original: The time has not yet come for us to intervene.
translation: 还不到我们涉入其中的时候。

original: There have been discontented murmurings among the [From.GetAdjective] [From.Monarch.GetTitle]'s subjects at [From.Monarch.GetHerHis] inability to deal with the threat we represent. As our power continues to grow, we can expect these murmurings to grow louder.
translation: [From.GetAdjective][From.Monarch.GetTitle]的属国间流传着不满的怨言，因为[From.Monarch.GetHerHis]无能面对我国的威胁。当我国实力继续增长，这些怨言的音量也会愈加增高。

original: We need but wait for their collapse.
translation: 我们仅需等待他们崩溃。

original: §Y[From.GetName]§!:\nHas §R10%§! progress towards the §YUnguarded Nomadic Frontier§! disaster.
translation: §Y[From.GetName]§!:\n存在 §R10%§!的进度朝向§Y不设防的游牧前线§!灾难

original: The [From.GetAdjective] [From.Monarch.GetTitle] is facing a severe struggle to maintain [From.Monarch.GetHerHis] authority over widespread fears at the threat we pose to [From.GetUsableName]. Our spies among them expect that, very soon, the discontent will erupt into open revolts and a collapse of the [From.Monarch.GetTitle]'s authority... offering us the ideal opportunity to seize the riches of China for ourselves.
translation: [From.GetAdjective][From.Monarch.GetTitle]正在挣扎于维持[From.Monarch.GetHerHis]权威，去面对我们施加在[From.GetUsableName]的广泛威胁。我们安插在他们那边的间谍预估很快，不满将会爆发成叛乱，[From.Monarch.GetTitle]的权威也会崩溃……这将带来让我们夺取中国财富的天赐良机。

original: §Y[From.GetName]§!:\nHas §R75%§! progress towards the §YUnguarded Nomadic Frontier§! disaster.
translation: §Y[From.GetName]§!:\n存在 §R75%§!的进度朝向§Y不设防的游牧前线§!灾难

original: As we are no longer considered a threat to [emperor_of_china.GetUsableName], their subjects are once again content with their rule.
translation: 既然我们不再被认为是[emperor_of_china.GetUsableName]的威胁，他们的属国再次满意于被其统治。

original: Worries over our threat have been been overtaken by other threats to the [emperor_of_china.GetUsableName], which threaten the internal cohesion of the state. Now might be our time to strike!
translation: 对我国威胁的焦虑已被[emperor_of_china.GetUsableName]的其他问题所取代，这些问题将威胁国家的内部凝聚力。现在也许是我们出击的时刻！

original: The Shun dynasty began as a rebellion against Ming authority, an uprising of farmers and peasants weary of being bled dry by the tax collectors of their overlords. Our people will gladly take up arms rather than be forced to suffer further hardship and famine.
translation: 顺朝脱胎于一支反抗明朝统治的起义军。这支起义军由被苛税杂捐榨干的富农与贫农组成。我们的人乐于拿起武器，而不是被迫忍受军中苦旅。

original: The leader of the Shun has been nicknamed the Dashing King. By officially adopting this title and using it in our dealings with foreign dignitaries, we can boost our reputation both domestically and abroad.
translation: 顺朝的领袖又被称为「闯王」。通过正式接受这一称号并将之用于与外国政要的交往中，我们可以增强我们在国内外的威望。

original: We have abolished the old grain taxes payment system, allowing the rural Shun lords to keep more of their revenues, with which they can pay their soldiers to fight, their farmers to farm, and their diplomats to represent them abroad. This additionally means there is money available should we need to borrow some.
translation: 我们废除了旧的粮食税收支付制度，允许农村的大顺乡绅保留更多的收入，它们可以用来支付士兵军饷、佃农工资，以及在国外代表他们的外交官。这还意味着如果我们需要借一些钱，就有钱可用。

original: The chosen name of our dynasty means "obedient to heaven". In keeping with this name, our troops have taken an oath of loyalty to our ruler, who they view as one with heavenly capabilities. As such, they are willing to train harder and become more disciplined to ensure a glorious outcome to their battles.
translation: 我们选择的王朝名称意为「顺天」。为了与这个名字保持一致，我们的军队宣誓效忠我们的统治者，他们认为他具有上天赋予的能力。因此，他们愿意更加努力训练，变得更加自律，以确保他们的战斗取得辉煌成果。

original: We have found new ways to make use of gunpowder in siege warfare and developed effective methods of scaling and breaking fort walls. With these methods, we can successfully lay siege to even the strongest forts, and easily capture and control provinces in wars.
translation: 我们已经找到了攻城战中火药的新用处，并开发出有效的剥落和破坏城堡城墙的方法。通过这些方法，我们可以成功围攻最强大的城堡，并在战争中轻松夺取和控制省份。

original: Our troops have been drilled in the usage of both hand-to-hand and ranged weapons. Proficient at using sticks, swords, knifes, bows and guns, our soldiers can fill any role we might require of them. Their versatility gives them the ability to dominate the battlefield.
translation: 我们的部队已经受训且装备了双手和远程武器。我们的士兵精通使用棍棒，剑，刀，弓和枪，可以填补我们可能需要的任何角色。他们的多功能性使他们能够主宰战场。

original: Although our dynasty emerged from humble origins, through our strength and justice we have won noblemen and commoners alike to our side. We are now seen as worthy claimants to the Mandate of Heaven, a legitimate ruling dynasty of the land of China.
translation: 虽然我们的王朝起源卑微，但通过我们的能力与正义，我们赢得了贵族和平民的支持。我们现在被视为天命的强力宣称者，即一个统治中华大地的正统王朝。
